data.Tom\u00e1\u0161 N\u011bmec:
Tomáš is a kind IT technician who is obsessed with the murder of his half sister Emilie, six years ago.

Tomáš Němec is a 24-year-old IT technician whose life is dominated by solving the murder of his half sister, Emilie Němec. Emilie was stabbed in 2013 and the killer was never brought to justice.

He is Czech. He started studying computing at college but never finished the course. He is allergic to shellfish. He has a severe phobia of water.

Physically, Tomáš is in pretty good shape. He is average-height with light skin, red blond hair and blue eyes. Unusually, he has a prosthetic foot; a shark ate his.

He grew up in a working class neighbourhood. His mother left when he was young, leaving him with his father, who was a drunk.

He is currently single. His most recent romance was with a student called Eliška Musilová, who was the same age as him. They broke up because Eliška couldn't deal with Tomáš's obsession with Emilie's death.

Tomáš's best friend is an IT technician called Roman ﻿Svoboda. They are inseparable. He also hangs around with Miroslav Javorský and Soňa Šebková. They enjoy cycling together.

personality.Hobbies: looking for clues, planking, interviewing suspects, cycling, going to the movies, eating out, charity work, escapology, jigsaw puzzles, bowling

background.Early years: Tomáš grew up in an impoverished neighbourhood. His mother left when he was young, leaving him with his father, who was a drunk.
background.Formative years: Tomáš started college but quit part way through the course. Tomáš got his first job as a sales assistant at office supplies store at age 19
background.Most traumatic childhood experience: His mother leaving when he was four.

miroslav_javorsk\u00fd.Relationship: They get on well most of the time

mat\u011bj_h\u00e1jkov\u00e1.Relationship: Tomáš and Matěj grew up together. Nevertheless, they are not particularly close.

emilie_n\u011bmec.Relationship: Tomáš is obsessed with solving Emilie’s murder

monika_n\u011bmec.Relationship: Tomáš and Monika grew up in separate homes but see each other a lot.

martin_n\u011bmec.Relationship: They do not get on well.

sandra_p\u00ed\u0161ov\u00e1.Reason for breakup: Sandra felt Tomáš was so cautious that he was afraid to live

eli\u0161ka_musilov\u00e1.Reason for breakup: Eliška couldn't deal with Tomáš's obsession with Emilie’s death

timeline.2013: Emilie Němec is murdered. Half sister (shared mother), Emilie dies aged 22 (murdered - stabbed)
timeline.2014: Starts work at Luxor book store as a sales assistant
timeline.2015: Tomáš is attacked by a shark and loses foot. Relationship with Sandra Píšová ends (Sandra felt Tomáš was so cautious that he was afraid to live).
timeline.2018: Gets together with Eliška Musilová. Resigns from job as a sales assistant at Luxor. Starts work at Arbes Technologies at IT technician
timeline.2019: Relationship with Eliška Musilová ends (Eliška couldn't deal with Tomáš's obsession Emilie’s death).
